Question: How many singers do we have?
Gold: SELECT count(*) FROM singer
Without Description: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM singer
With Description: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM singer

Question: What is the total number of singers?
Gold: SELECT count(*) FROM singer
Without Description: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM singer
With Description: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM singer

Question: Show name, country, age for all singers ordered by age from the oldest to the youngest.
Gold: SELECT name ,  country ,  age FROM singer ORDER BY age DESC
Without Description: SELECT s.name, s.country, s.age FROM singer AS s ORDER BY s.age DESC
With Description: SELECT name, country, age FROM singer ORDER BY age DESC

Question: What are the names, countries, and ages for every singer in descending order of age?
Gold: SELECT name ,  country ,  age FROM singer ORDER BY age DESC
Without Description: SELECT s.name, s.country, s.age FROM singer AS s ORDER BY s.age DESC
With Description: SELECT Name, Country, Age FROM Singer ORDER BY Age DESC

Question: What is the average, minimum, and maximum age of all singers from France?
Gold: SELECT avg(age) ,  min(age) ,  max(age) FROM singer WHERE country  =  'France'
Without Description: SELECT AVG(age) AS average_age, MIN(age) AS minimum_age, MAX(age) AS maximum_age FROM singer WHERE country = 'France' AND is_male = 1
With Description: SELECT AVG(age) AS Average_Age, MIN(age) AS Min_Age, MAX(age) AS Max_Age FROM singer WHERE country = 'France' AND is_male = TRUE

Question: What is the average, minimum, and maximum age for all French singers?
Gold: SELECT avg(age) ,  min(age) ,  max(age) FROM singer WHERE country  =  'France'
Without Description: SELECT AVG(age) AS average_age, MIN(age) AS min_age, MAX(age) AS max_age FROM singer WHERE country = 'France' AND is_male = 1
With Description: SELECT AVG(age) AS Average_Age, MIN(age) AS Min_Age, MAX(age) AS Max_Age FROM singer WHERE country = 'France' AND is_male = 'F'

Question: Show the name and the release year of the song by the youngest singer.
Gold: SELECT song_name ,  song_release_year FROM singer ORDER BY age LIMIT 1
Without Description: SELECT s.name, s.song_release_year FROM singer AS s WHERE s.age = (SELECT MIN(s2.age) FROM singer AS s2)
With Description: SELECT s.name AS singer_name, ss.song_release_year AS song_release_year FROM singer AS s JOIN (SELECT si.singer_id, si.song_release_year FROM singer_in_concert AS sic JOIN singer AS si ON sic.singer_id = si.singer_id) AS ss ON s.singer_id = ss.singer_id WHERE s.age = (SELECT MIN(s2.age) FROM singer AS s2)

Question: What are the names and release years for all the songs of the youngest singer?
Gold: SELECT song_name ,  song_release_year FROM singer ORDER BY age LIMIT 1
Without Description: SELECT s.name AS singer_name, so.song_name AS song_name, so.release_year AS song_release_year FROM singer AS s INNER JOIN (SELECT si.singer_id FROM singer AS si ORDER BY si.age ASC LIMIT 1) AS youngest_singer ON s.singer_id = youngest_singer.youngest_singer_id INNER JOIN song AS so ON s.singer_id = so.song_owner_id
With Description: SELECT s.name AS song_name, s.song_release_year FROM song s INNER JOIN singer y ON y.youngest_singer = s.singer_id WHERE y.age = MIN(y.age) ORDER BY s.song_release_year

Question: What are all distinct countries where singers above age 20 are from?
Gold: SELECT DISTINCT country FROM singer WHERE age  >  20
Without Description: SELECT DISTINCT country FROM singer WHERE age > 20
With Description: SELECT DISTINCT country FROM singer WHERE age > 20

Question: What are  the different countries with singers above age 20?
Gold: SELECT DISTINCT country FROM singer WHERE age  >  20
Without Description: SELECT s.country FROM singer AS s WHERE s.age > 20
With Description: SELECT DISTINCT Country FROM Singer WHERE Age > 20

Question: Show all countries and the number of singers in each country.
Gold: SELECT country ,  count(*) FROM singer GROUP BY country
Without Description: SELECT singer.country, COUNT(singer.singer_id) FROM singer GROUP BY singer.country
With Description: SELECT COUNTRY, COUNT(Singer_ID) FROM Singer GROUP BY Country

Question: How many singers are from each country?
Gold: SELECT country ,  count(*) FROM singer GROUP BY country
Without Description: SELECT country, COUNT(singer_id) FROM singer GROUP BY country
With Description: SELECT Country, COUNT(*) FROM singer GROUP BY Country

Question: List all song names by singers above the average age.
Gold: SELECT song_name FROM singer WHERE age  >  (SELECT avg(age) FROM singer)
Without Description: SELECT s.song_name FROM singer AS s JOIN (SELECT AVG(age) as avg_age FROM singer) AS a WHERE s.age > a.avg_age
With Description: SELECT Song_Name FROM Singer WHERE Age > (SELECT AVG(Age) FROM Singer)

Question: What are all the song names by singers who are older than average?
Gold: SELECT song_name FROM singer WHERE age  >  (SELECT avg(age) FROM singer)
Without Description: SELECT s.song_name FROM singer AS s WHERE s.age > (SELECT AVG(s.age) FROM singer AS s)
With Description: SELECT Song_Name FROM Singer WHERE Age > (SELECT AVG(Age) FROM Singer)

Question: Show location and name for all stadiums with a capacity between 5000 and 10000.
Gold: SELECT LOCATION ,  name FROM stadium WHERE capacity BETWEEN 5000 AND 10000
Without Description: SELECT s.location, s.name FROM stadium AS s WHERE s.capacity BETWEEN 5000 AND 10000
With Description: SELECT location, name FROM stadium WHERE capacity BETWEEN 5000 AND 10000

Question: What are the locations and names of all stations with capacity between 5000 and 10000?
Gold: SELECT LOCATION ,  name FROM stadium WHERE capacity BETWEEN 5000 AND 10000
Without Description: SELECT s.location, s.name FROM stadium AS s WHERE s.capacity BETWEEN 5000 AND 10000
With Description: SELECT location, name FROM stadium WHERE capacity BETWEEN 5000 AND 10000

Question: What is the maximum capacity and the average of all stadiums ?
Gold: select max(capacity), average from stadium
Without Description: SELECT MAX(capacity), AVG(average) FROM stadium
With Description: SELECT MAX(capacity) AS max_capacity, AVG(average) AS avg_stadium FROM stadium

Question: What is the average and maximum capacities for all stadiums ?
Gold: select avg(capacity) ,  max(capacity) from stadium
Without Description: SELECT AVG(capacity) AS average_capacity, MAX(capacity) AS maximum_capacity FROM stadium
With Description: SELECT AVG(capacity) AS Average_Capacity, MAX(capacity) AS Maximum_Capacity FROM stadium

Question: What is the name and capacity for the stadium with highest average attendance?
Gold: SELECT name ,  capacity FROM stadium ORDER BY average DESC LIMIT 1
Without Description: SELECT s.name, s.capacity FROM stadium AS s WHERE s.average = (SELECT MAX(average) FROM stadium)
With Description: SELECT Name, Capacity FROM stadium WHERE Average = (SELECT MAX(Average) FROM stadium)

Question: What is the name and capacity for the stadium with the highest average attendance?
Gold: SELECT name ,  capacity FROM stadium ORDER BY average DESC LIMIT 1
Without Description: SELECT S.name, S.capacity FROM stadium AS S WHERE S.average = (SELECT MAX(avg) FROM (SELECT AVG(attendance) as avg, stadium_id FROM concert GROUP BY stadium_id))  Based on the given schema and question, this SQL statement selects the name and capacity from the stadium table where the average attendance is the highest.
With Description: SELECT Name, Capacity FROM Stadium WHERE Average = (SELECT MAX(Average) FROM Stadium)

Question: How many concerts are there in year 2014 or 2015?
Gold: SELECT count(*) FROM concert WHERE YEAR  =  2014 OR YEAR  =  2015
Without Description: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM concert WHERE year IN (2014, 2015)
With Description: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM concert WHERE year IN (2014, 2015)

Question: How many concerts occurred in 2014 or 2015?
Gold: SELECT count(*) FROM concert WHERE YEAR  =  2014 OR YEAR  =  2015
Without Description: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT * FROM concert WHERE year IN (2014, 2015)) AS relevant_concerts
With Description: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM concert WHERE year IN (2014, 2015)

Question: Show the stadium name and the number of concerts in each stadium.
Gold: SELECT T2.name ,  count(*) FROM concert AS T1 JOIN stadium AS T2 ON T1.stadium_id  =  T2.stadium_id GROUP BY T1.stadium_id
Without Description: SELECT s.name AS stadium_name, COUNT(c.concert_id) AS num_of_concerts FROM stadium AS s JOIN concert AS c ON s.stadium_id = c.stadium_id GROUP BY s.name
With Description: SELECT      s.name AS stadium_name,      COUNT(c.concert_id) AS num_of_concerts  FROM      stadium s  JOIN      concert c ON s.stadium_id = c.stadium_id  GROUP BY      s.stadium_id

Question: For each stadium, how many concerts play there?
Gold: SELECT T2.name ,  count(*) FROM concert AS T1 JOIN stadium AS T2 ON T1.stadium_id  =  T2.stadium_id GROUP BY T1.stadium_id
Without Description: SELECT stadium.stadium_id, COUNT(concert.concert_id) FROM stadium LEFT JOIN concert ON stadium.stadium_id = concert.stadium_id GROUP BY stadium.stadium_id
With Description: SELECT s.name AS stadium_name, COUNT(c.concert_id) as num_concerts  FROM stadium s  JOIN concert c ON s.stadium_id = c.stadium_id  GROUP BY s.stadium_id

Question: Show the stadium name and capacity with most number of concerts in year 2014 or after.
Gold: SELECT T2.name ,  T2.capacity FROM concert AS T1 JOIN stadium AS T2 ON T1.stadium_id  =  T2.stadium_id WHERE T1.year  >=  2014 GROUP BY T2.stadium_id ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1
Without Description: SELECT stadium.name, stadium.capacity FROM stadium INNER JOIN (SELECT concert.stadium_id, COUNT(*) as concert_count FROM concert WHERE YEAR(concert.date) >= 2014 GROUP BY concert.stadium_id ORDER BY concert_count DESC) as year_concerts ON stadium.stadium_id = year_concerts.stadium_id LIMIT 1
With Description: SELECT S.name, S.capacity FROM stadium AS S INNER JOIN (SELECT C.stadium_id, COUNT(*) as concert_count FROM concert AS C WHERE C.year >= 2014 GROUP BY C.stadium_id ORDER BY concert_count DESC LIMIT 1) AS T ON S.stadium_id = T.stadium_id

Question: What is the name and capacity of the stadium with the most concerts after 2013 ?
Gold: select t2.name ,  t2.capacity from concert as t1 join stadium as t2 on t1.stadium_id  =  t2.stadium_id where t1.year  >  2013 group by t2.stadium_id order by count(*) desc limit 1
Without Description: SELECT s.name, s.capacity  FROM stadium AS s  JOIN concert AS c ON s.stadium_id = c.stadium_id  WHERE c.year > 2013  GROUP BY s.stadium_id  ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC, s.name ASC  LIMIT 1
With Description: SELECT S.name, S.capacity FROM stadium AS S INNER JOIN (SELECT C.stadium_id, COUNT(DISTINCT C.concert_ID) as concert_count FROM concert AS C WHERE YEAR(C.date) > 2013 GROUP BY C.stadium_id ORDER BY -concert_count LIMIT 1) AS stats ON S.stadium_id = stats.stadium_id

Question: Which year has most number of concerts?
Gold: SELECT YEAR FROM concert GROUP BY YEAR ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1
With Description: SELECT Year FROM Concert GROUP BY Year ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC LIMIT 1

Question: What is the year that had the most concerts?
Gold: SELECT YEAR FROM concert GROUP BY YEAR ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1
Without Description: SELECT year, COUNT(*) as num_concerts FROM concert GROUP BY year ORDER BY num_concerts DESC LIMIT 1
With Description: SELECT year FROM concert GROUP BY year ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC LIMIT 1

Question: Show the stadium names without any concert.
Gold: SELECT name FROM stadium WHERE stadium_id NOT IN (SELECT stadium_id FROM concert)
Without Description: SELECT DISTINCT s.name FROM stadium AS s LEFT JOIN concert AS c ON s.stadium_id = c.stadium_id WHERE c.concert_id IS NULL
With Description: SELECT s.name FROM stadium AS s LEFT JOIN concert AS c ON s.stadium_id = c.stadium_id WHERE c.concert_id IS NULL

Question: What are the names of the stadiums without any concerts?
Gold: SELECT name FROM stadium WHERE stadium_id NOT IN (SELECT stadium_id FROM concert)
Without Description: SELECT S.name FROM stadium AS S LEFT JOIN concert AS C ON S.stadium_id = C.stadium_id WHERE C.concert_id IS NULL
With Description: SELECT [name] FROM stadium WHERE [concert_id] IS NULL

Question: Show countries where a singer above age 40 and a singer below 30 are from.
Gold: SELECT country FROM singer WHERE age  >  40 INTERSECT SELECT country FROM singer WHERE age  <  30
Without Description: SELECT s.country FROM singer AS s WHERE s.age > 40 UNION SELECT s.country FROM singer AS s WHERE s.age < 30
With Description: SELECT s.country FROM singer AS s WHERE s.age > 40 UNION SELECT s.country FROM singer AS s WHERE s.age < 30

Question: Show names for all stadiums except for stadiums having a concert in year 2014.
Gold: SELECT name FROM stadium EXCEPT SELECT T2.name FROM concert AS T1 JOIN stadium AS T2 ON T1.stadium_id  =  T2.stadium_id WHERE T1.year  =  2014
Without Description: SELECT S.name FROM singer AS S INNER JOIN (SELECT C.concert_id, C.stadium_id FROM concert AS C WHERE C.year <> 2014) AS R ON S.singer_id = R.singer_id
With Description: SELECT Name FROM stadium WHERE stadium_id NOT IN (SELECT stadium_id FROM concert WHERE year = 2014)

Question: What are the names of all stadiums that did not have a concert in 2014?
Gold: SELECT name FROM stadium EXCEPT SELECT T2.name FROM concert AS T1 JOIN stadium AS T2 ON T1.stadium_id  =  T2.stadium_id WHERE T1.year  =  2014
Without Description: SELECT S.name FROM stadium AS S LEFT JOIN (SELECT C.stadium_id FROM concert AS C WHERE YEAR(C.date) = 2014) AS N ON S.stadium_id = N.stadium_id WHERE N.stadium_id IS NULL
With Description: SELECT Name FROM stadium WHERE stadium_id NOT IN (SELECT stadium_id FROM concert WHERE year = 2014)

Question: Show the name and theme for all concerts and the number of singers in each concert.
Gold: SELECT T2.concert_name ,  T2.theme ,  count(*) FROM singer_in_concert AS T1 JOIN concert AS T2 ON T1.concert_id  =  T2.concert_id GROUP BY T2.concert_id
Without Description: SELECT c.concert_name, c.theme, COUNT(s.singer_id) as num_singers FROM concert AS c LEFT JOIN singer_in_concert AS sic ON c.concert_id = sic.concert_id LEFT JOIN singer AS s ON sic.singer_id = s.singer_id GROUP BY c.concert_name, c.theme
With Description: SELECT c.name AS "Concert Name", c.theme AS "

Question: What are the names , themes , and number of singers for every concert ?
Gold: select t2.concert_name ,  t2.theme ,  count(*) from singer_in_concert as t1 join concert as t2 on t1.concert_id  =  t2.concert_id group by t2.concert_id
Without Description: SELECT c.concert_name, c.theme, COUNT(s.name) as singer_count FROM concert AS c JOIN singer_in_concert AS sic ON c.concert_id = sic.concert_id JOIN singer AS s ON sic.singer_id = s.singer_id GROUP BY c.concert_name
With Description: SELECT c.concert_name, c.theme, COUNT(s.singer_id) AS num_singers FROM concert AS c LEFT JOIN singer_in_concert AS sic ON c.concert_id = sic.concert_id LEFT JOIN singer AS s ON sic.singer_id = s.singer_id GROUP BY c.concert_name, c.theme

Question: List singer names and number of concerts for each singer.
Gold: SELECT T2.name ,  count(*) FROM singer_in_concert AS T1 JOIN singer AS T2 ON T1.singer_id  =  T2.singer_id GROUP BY T2.singer_id
Without Description: SELECT s.name AS singer_name, COUNT(sc.concert_id) AS num_of_concerts FROM singer AS s INNER JOIN singer_in_concert AS sc ON s.singer_id = sc.singer_id GROUP BY s.singer_id
With Description: SELECT s.name AS singer_name, COUNT(sic.concert_ID) AS num_of_concerts FROM singer AS s INNER JOIN singer_in_concert AS sic ON s.singer_id = sic.singer_id GROUP BY s.name

Question: What are the names of the singers and number of concerts for each person?
Gold: SELECT T2.name ,  count(*) FROM singer_in_concert AS T1 JOIN singer AS T2 ON T1.singer_id  =  T2.singer_id GROUP BY T2.singer_id
Without Description: SELECT s.name, COUNT(c.concert_id) FROM singer AS s INNER JOIN singer_in_concert AS x ON s.singer_id = x.singer_id INNER JOIN concert AS c ON c.concert_id = x.concert_id GROUP BY s.name
With Description: SELECT s.name AS singer_name, COUNT(sic.concert_ID) AS concert_count FROM singer s JOIN singer_in_concert sic ON s.singer_id = sic.singer_id GROUP BY s.name

Question: List all singer names in concerts in year 2014.
Gold: SELECT T2.name FROM singer_in_concert AS T1 JOIN singer AS T2 ON T1.singer_id  =  T2.singer_id JOIN concert AS T3 ON T1.concert_id  =  T3.concert_id WHERE T3.year  =  2014
Without Description: SELECT s.name FROM singer AS s INNER JOIN (SELECT si.singer_id FROM singer_in_concert ASsic INNER JOIN concert AS c ON sic.concert_id=c.concert_id WHERE c.year=2014) AS to_select ON s.singer_id=to_select.singer_id
With Description: SELECT s.name FROM singer AS s INNER JOIN (SELECT si.singer_id FROM singer_in_concert ASsic INNER JOIN concert AS c ON sic.concert_id = c.concert_id WHERE c.year = 2014) AS t ON s.singer_id = t.singer_id

Question: What are the names of the singers who performed in a concert in 2014?
Gold: SELECT T2.name FROM singer_in_concert AS T1 JOIN singer AS T2 ON T1.singer_id  =  T2.singer_id JOIN concert AS T3 ON T1.concert_id  =  T3.concert_id WHERE T3.year  =  2014
Without Description: SELECT s.name FROM singer AS s JOIN (SELECT si.singer_id FROM singer_in_concert ASsic JOIN concert AS c ON sic.concert_id = c.concert_id AND c.year = 2014 JOIN singer AS si ON sic.singer_id = si.singer_id) AS relevant_singers ON s.singer_id = relevant_singers.singer_id
With Description: SELECT s.name FROM singer AS s JOIN (SELECT si.singer_id FROM singer_in_concert AS si JOIN concert AS c ON si.concert_id = c.concert_id WHERE c.year = 2014) AS perf ON s.singer_id = perf.singer_id

Question: what is the name and nation of the singer who have a song having 'Hey' in its name?
Gold: SELECT name ,  country FROM singer WHERE song_name LIKE '%Hey%'
Without Description: SELECT s.name AS singer_name, s.country AS nation FROM singer s WHERE EXISTS (     SELECT 1 FROM song so WHERE so.title LIKE '%Hey%' AND so.singer_id = s.singer_id LIMIT 1 ) LIMIT 1
With Description: SELECT s.name, s.country FROM singer AS s WHERE s.song_name LIKE '%Hey%'

Question: What is the name and country of origin of every singer who has a song with the word 'Hey' in its title?
Gold: SELECT name ,  country FROM singer WHERE song_name LIKE '%Hey%'
Without Description: SELECT s.name, s.country FROM singers AS s JOIN songs AS so ON s.singer_id = so.singer_id WHERE LOWER(so.title) LIKE LOWER('%Hey%')"
With Description: SELECT s.name AS singer_name, s.country AS country FROM singer s WHERE LOWER(s.song_name) LIKE '%hey%'

Question: Find the name and location of the stadiums which some concerts happened in the years of both 2014 and 2015.
Gold: SELECT T2.name ,  T2.location FROM concert AS T1 JOIN stadium AS T2 ON T1.stadium_id  =  T2.stadium_id WHERE T1.Year  =  2014 INTERSECT SELECT T2.name ,  T2.location FROM concert AS T1 JOIN stadium AS T2 ON T1.stadium_id  =  T2.stadium_id WHERE T1.Year  =  2015
Without Description: SELECT DISTINCT s.name, s.location FROM stadium AS s INNER JOIN concert AS c ON s.stadium_id = c.stadium_id WHERE (c.year = 2014 OR c.year = 2015) GROUP BY s.name, s.location HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT c.year) = 2
With Description: SELECT S.name, S.location FROM stadium AS S INNER JOIN (SELECT stadium_id FROM concert WHERE year IN (2014, 2015) GROUP BY stadium_id) AS C ON S.stadium_id = C.stadium_id

Question: What are the names and locations of the stadiums that had concerts that occurred in both 2014 and 2015?
Gold: SELECT T2.name ,  T2.location FROM concert AS T1 JOIN stadium AS T2 ON T1.stadium_id  =  T2.stadium_id WHERE T1.Year  =  2014 INTERSECT SELECT T2.name ,  T2.location FROM concert AS T1 JOIN stadium AS T2 ON T1.stadium_id  =  T2.stadium_id WHERE T1.Year  =  2015
Without Description: SELECT s.name, s.location  FROM stadium AS s  JOIN concert AS c ON s.stadium_id = c.stadium_id  WHERE c.year IN (2014, 2015)  GROUP BY s.name, s.location
With Description: SELECT S.name, S.location  FROM stadium AS S  JOIN concert AS C ON S.stadium_id = C.stadium_id  WHERE (C.year = 2014 OR C.year = 2015)  GROUP BY S.name, S.location

Question: Find the number of concerts happened in the stadium with the highest capacity .
Gold: select count(*) from concert where stadium_id = (select stadium_id from stadium order by capacity desc limit 1)
Without Description: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM concert INNER JOIN stadium ON concert.stadium_id = stadium.stadium_id WHERE stadium.capacity = (SELECT MAX(capacity) FROM stadium)
With Description: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM concert WHERE stadium_id = (SELECT stadium_id FROM stadium ORDER BY capacity DESC LIMIT 1)

Question: What are the number of concerts that occurred in the stadium with the largest capacity ?
Gold: select count(*) from concert where stadium_id = (select stadium_id from stadium order by capacity desc limit 1)
Without Description: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM concert WHERE stadium_id IN (SELECT stadium_id FROM stadium ORDER BY capacity DESC LIMIT 1)
With Description: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM concert WHERE stadium_id = (SELECT stadium_id FROM stadium ORDER BY capacity DESC LIMIT 1)
